title: Frontend Developer (Intern)
description: I’m currently interning at TM30 Global Limited, where I am designing clean and responsive user interfaces for banking applications using HTML, CSS, and React.js.
I have created a static prototype of the dashboard that meets the design specifications and lays the foundation for future interactivity.
Throughout this process, I am enhancing my JavaScript skills, exploring React Redux and TypeScript.
I collaborate with senior developers during sprint planning, stand‑up meetings, and code reviews to learn best practices.

title: Front. Developer (Academic Projects)
description: I served as the Frontend Lead on multiple capstone projects, most notably a mobile‑first React Biometric Attendance System integrating Firebase and an Arduino fingerprint scanner, and a Python/OpenCV‑powered OCR Vehicle Verification System.
I focused on building clean, responsive interfaces, ensuring robust API connections, optimized data handling and storage with Firebase, and upholding accessibility and performance standards.
I partnered closely with classmates to lead design reviews, documentation efforts, and presentations to academic panels.

title: Freelancer
description: I’ve teamed up with Upwork clients to turn design mockups into fast, responsive sites using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JS.
I build clean, accessible layouts across all browsers and add UX extras like sliders, modals, and live form validation.
I speed things up by trimming assets and lazy‑loading content for snappier load times.
I keep requirements on point and hit every deadline with clear messaging and video calls.
